name: Gun Polygon
description:
Gun Polygon

Gun Polygon is both a puzzle game and a shooter game.

You have to shoot the falling polygons to prevent them from touching the red line at the bottom of the screen, but you can only destroy them if your weapon has the same color as them.

  1. Slide a finger on the screen to move and shoot;
  2. Move the finger away from the screen to change colors;
  3. Use the right color to shoot the falling polygons.
